titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should develop and adopt a comprehensive cybersecurity policy.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should develop and adopt a comprehensive cybersecurity policy.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States should adopt a comprehensive cybersecurity policy that clearly defines acts of aggression, acts of war, and other related events in cyberspace, including any commensurate responses to any such act or event.
